php.LBL_ALTBODY: Đây là nội dung văn bản đơn giản dành cho trình duyệt email không hỗ trợ HTML
php.LBL_CUSTOMER_COMMENTS: Khách hàng đã cung cấp thông tin bổ sung sau đây để trả lời bạn:
php.LBL_LOGIN_REVOKED: Thông tin đăng nhập bị thu hồi. Xin vui lòng liên hệ với quản trị của bạn.
php.LBL_RESPOND: Vui lòng trả lời vé  hỗ trợ trên trong thời gian sớm nhất.
php.LBL_STATUS_UPDATE: Trạng thái vé được cập nhật như
php.LBL_SUBJECT_PORTAL_LOGIN_DETAILS: Liên quan đến thông tin đăng nhập cổng thông tin khách hàng
php.Title: Title
php.LBL_NO_ACCOUNTS_IN_HELPDESK: The ticket is not related to any Account. Please create a relation.
php.LBL_NO_SERVICE_CONTRACTS_IN_HELPDESK: The ticket is not related to any SLA
php.LBL_ACCOUNTS_NO_ACTIVE_SERVICE_CONTRACTS: The Account has no active SLA
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_CREATE:
We received your message and it will soon be processed.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_CLOSED:
Our experts have resolved your ticket. Below you can find detailed information about the work we performed.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_MODIFICATION:
Our specialists are working on your ticket.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_OWNER_CREATED: A new ticket has been created. You can find more information below:
php.LBL_ADD_TIME_CONTROL: Add working time before you close the ticket
php.LBL_CLOSE_RELATED_TICKETS: Before you close this ticket, close related tickets
